title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set
OB: When adding a table report item without setting the dataset and then trying to create a new table group, the group dialog is not displayed.
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set. Users should be able to define a group even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try creating a new table group.
